title: COVID-19 | Tapestry 360 Health
description: We specialize in COVID-19. Learn more about our medical services and find a doctor and health center near you.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Schedule a COVID-19 vaccine appointment by calling our appointment line at [773-751-7800](tel://+17737517800). Check our online resources to learn get COVID-19 facts, learn about home tests and more. Getting vaccinated and staying up to date with boosters is the best way to stay safe. When you are vaccinated, you also help protect everyone around you from getting sick or even dying from COVID-19. Together we can keep each other safe and help end the pandemic. We know Omicron and more recent variants of COVID-19 spread more easily than the original SARS-CoV-2 virus. Current vaccines remain the best public health measure to protect people from COVID-19, slow transmission, and reduce the likelihood of new variants emerging. Stay up to date with the latest on COVID-19: The CDC is [ sharing the latest information online here](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/variants/omicron-variant.html). For updates on vaccine distribution efforts and availability please visit the [Chicago Coronavirus Response Center](https://www.chicago.gov/city/en/sites/covid-19/home.html) or [Illinois Department of Public Health](https://dph.illinois.gov/covid19.html). To keep up with the latest news, please check here or watch our social media. You can also [sign up for email updates](https://lp.constantcontactpages.com/su/jYq5jsT).
